place_description: Borboleta Café is a vibrant, community-focused coffee shop located in the heart of Rock Hill, SC. Our mission is to create a welcoming, safe space where coffee lovers can connect, grow, and be inspired. We proudly serve high-quality, locally roasted coffee from Pure Intentions and offer a menu full of carefully crafted espresso drinks, teas, fresh pastries, and more. Whether you're looking to fuel your day with a delicious cup of coffee, attend one of our financial literacy workshops, or simply enjoy a cozy corner to relax- Borboleta Café is here to nourish your body and mind.

reviews_data.review_text: The best matcha I've ever had, a beautifully decorated space, and an extremely friendly owner and staff. I can't recommend this place enough!

Excellent services and very friendly people great business
Highly recommended

Honestly this is hands down the best matcha latte that I've ever had! Barista was super friendly and she made my drink even better than I thought it would be. This is now my new spot, highly recommend 10/10.

Please try this drink: matcha latte w strawberry add oatmilk and vanilla syrup.

tried three drinks today with my sister and each were INCREDIBLE! the speciality drinks for february have me wanting to make a daily stop. i only wish their hours and location were better (im out of rock hill headed to charlotte by 8am most days!) but maybe continued patronage will help with that! don't sleep on this cafe, rock hill!

It's so cute in here! If you're looking for a great place to relax and get some REALLY yummy coffee, definitely give this place a go! I got an iced vanilla latte (with a little lavender) and a cinnamon roll. Both were fantastic! And I count myself as a bit of a picky brat when it comes to iced coffee. This ticked all the boxes for me.

There's also a really cute little "build a bouquet" cart inside where you can pick out 10 pretty flowers for your own custom bouquet for 18 dollars (you pay Venmo for this to the business!)

Absolutely will be coming back here! On top of the great drinks and food and atmosphere, the staff is also super sweet and knowledgeable!

A Cozy Little Gem!
I stopped by this charming cafe and was pleasantly surprised! The Chai latte tasted like a warm hug--perfectly spiced and comforting. I also tried the blueberry muffin, which was fresh, warm, and absolutely delicious. The atmosphere was cozy, and the staff was friendly. I'll definitely be back!
A wonderful and welcoming coffee shop!
Great new coffee shop. Loved the decor. I tried the avocado toast and it was amazing. Will definitely be returning.

Simply amazing. With all of the chaos that seems to exude throughout the world, this place is so refreshing and definitely an escape from reality. From some of the best customer service around to the delicious drinks and treats; they have definitely earned them a lifetime customer. Great job!!
Love this cafe!!! It is cozy, friendly and welcoming!!! The coffee and food is wonderful. The entire experience has been amazing. Thank you for great memories!
Such a sweet place! So cute inside, the owner and staff are super friendly and the coffee I got was so so good! I got the bloom and bean latte. I'll be back for sure.
Tried this place today for the first time, it was amazing! Staff was so helpful & friendly.   The ALMA DULCE was sooo good! Great vibes!

I happened to see a post on Instagram in passing and decided to try it out! The staff were the friendliest I have ever experienced at any of the coffee shops in the area. The cafe itself was adorable and I loved the seating. I enjoyed my iced vanilla latte and the kind staff who started up a conversation while taking my order. Excited to go back and try other flavors. It is great to see a local woman owned business to support.

I LOVE THIS PLACE! I came in a little more than an hour before close and the service was amazing Jaz and Aliyah (the baristas) were so patient and kind. They gave me great suggestions and told me all about the local pastries! They have pistachio and oat milk which is great for those who's are non-dairy. I got an iced mocha with pistachio milk and mocha cold foam it was delicious . I also got a sourdough cinnamon roll and avocado toast, it was definitely made with love. I love the mission to be eco-friendly and that they are women owned. Overall a great place for a sweet treat and it's got great atmosphere for studying and working!! Will be back :)

My first visit. I ordered macchiato with oat milk and the avocado toast on sourdough bread with egg, pickled onions and feta cheese. Both were delicious! The seating was comfortable and the setting bright. Soft background music was conducive to conversation. A great combination. Well worth going back.

First time visiting! I was so excited to check out a brand new coffee spot! I ordered the Lucky Charms Latte with oat milk, and a sourdough Cinnamon roll. Both were delicious! Perfect coffee to flavor ratio! I sat and relaxed and the staff was so welcoming and chatted with me. I will be back with friends! I love their mission of community and environmental awareness!
Absolutely beautiful space, amazing coffee and food! I love the atmosphere and the service was fast and great. I look forward to coming here much more often!

Cuando llegue a Borboleta Cafe me senti como en casa un ambiente my bonito y relajante, el cafe muy rico no me habia tomado algo asi hace mucho tiempo los bocadillos delicioso mi preferido el avocado toast, el servicio excelente las chicas muy atentas y serviciales se los recomiendo, mi opinion 5/5 Gracias

This is a  wonderful new coffee shop and I am so impressed. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and welcoming atmosphere & friendly staff. The art on the wall is absolutely AMAZING!  The decor is chic and modern, yet cozy, making it the perfect coffee lounge spot. The coffee is absolutely top-notch, with a rich, smooth flavor that clearly comes from high-quality beans.
They offer a fantastic variety of drinks, from classic espresso to flavor add ons! The pastries and snacks are equally delightful, especially the sourdough cinnamon buns!!! To die for!! What makes this place even more special is that it's women-owned. You can feel the passion and dedication in every detail, from the friendly service to the carefully curated menu. I highly recommend stopping by this gem of a coffee shop. I will be going all the time!

Lovely local coffee shop with all of the classics and some unique innovations too! Very welcoming atmosphere and the women that run the place were super kind. I absolutely loved that one of their milk alternatives was pistachio milk
Great cafe and people. Cortadito was sweet and strong, can't wait to go back and try more, especially the pistachio milk.

WOW! Best coffee i've had in a while... this is one of those gems you stumble upon on vacation and think "man i wish we had this at home!" the avocado toast is actually to die for. The girls here were so sweet. I definitely see myself coming back.

Great team working, genuine and professional
Gently and courtesy

This place has the best matcha and avocado toast I've ever had! The atmosphere is comfortable, and has a personal touch that feels invigorating and like home away from home! I will definitely be driving from Charlotte to come here from now on. It's worth it!

Forget the other coffee places in Rock Hill... dont even think about trying to find a better place in Charlotte. This is the spot!

Coffee is amazing! The temperature is fantastic, and the flavor is amazing.

This is the ambrosia of the gods!

Oh, and flavor wise, the coffee isn't sour and tastes like actual coffee, not burnt like Dunkin or Starbucks! It's local and independently owned.

Oh, and atmosphere! Calm music, great little tables, and chairs i could spend hours here just working.

Don't even worry about parking. You have a whole parking lot to choose from.

Now there are cons... I want more couches to lounge in while I read... I know picky picky me, but hey, I can always ask.

Love this place! (^_^)/"
